other_tests.changes_over_time: The headaches gradually resolved during a 2-month period.

other_tests.findings: Opening pressure of 38 cm of water
other_tests.changes_over_time: On follow-up 1 month later, the opening pressure was 20 cm of water and the headaches improved further.

other_tests.findings: Diffuse theta-range slowing and intermittent delta-range slowing over the anterior regions
Thin leptomeninges with no inflammatory infiltrate, perivascular inflammatory-cell infiltrates predominantly composed of CD3 and CD8 T cells, no evidence of encephalitis or vasculitis.
